organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

extras.value:
Currently being rolled out and will take over from the Probation Trust Case Management System. The following statistical publications are produced using data from this source: Offender Management Statistics Quarterly (and annual tables published in April each year).

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/192314/omsq-q4-oct-dec-2012__2_.pdf
